ygData.messageBody:
Charm Kite after 27

Arud Bastad
40th Level Songstacker on Bristlebane
-----Original Message-----
From:
sentto-160851-24538-987657202-matosvr=theriver.com@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-24538-987657202-matosvr=theriver.com@....c
om]On Behalf Of Bill Costlow
Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2001 10:13 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] soloing strategies



I would lament/chains/bellow pull from the front of the goblin mines in
Ill Omen. ***pull all the way across the vally, to the left of the mine
entrance*** to avoid wandering gobs and the occasional sarnak -- use
instrument attack and you'll level quickly.

onur.yildirim@... wrote:
Hi there all fellow bards, I am new to this group and I already spent
much of my eq-allocated time here on these pages today, thanks to
your messages.

My question is: What are the possibilities for a bard around mid
twenties to get some good xp from soloing? Or shall I forget about it?

Thanks in advance.

Loredair
of
Morrell-Thule.
